data.name: Crazy Kung Fu
data.description:
Are you ready to start your KUNG FU FITNESS journey today?

With a focused mind and a strong body, embark on the challenge to become the greatest Kung Fu master of all time! Join Crazy Kung Fu to start your training, improve your reflexes, get fit, and become the ultimate Kung Fu force!

It won’t be easy, so keep your wits about you! As you climb the ranks and master new techniques, you’ll face increasingly difficult challenges that will push you to your limits—and help you discover new limits you didn’t know you had! You’ll grow stronger and healthier, move on instinct, and anticipate the action ahead of time—you’ll be unstoppable!

KEY FEATURES
• Multiplayer: compete with other players worldwide!
• Use your hands and body to engage in unique reflex-based gameplay that will get your heart rate up and teach you new skills.
• Embark across 72 levels and 4 game modes, with high-level challenges and gameplay modifiers.
• See how well you performed after each level, with statistics on your range and accuracy, as well as your punch, dodge, and block counts. Target your weaknesses to push towards victory!
• Train in 6 stunning environments, including your own dojo and a tranquil bamboo forest, each with their own original and immersive soundtracks!
• Unlock new locations, bracers, achievements, and challenges.
• Challenge your friends and watch yourself climb up the live leaderboards as you play.
• Enjoy 90Hz (Quest 2).

changelog.change_log:
V1.2: Christmas update!

- New mod: NO REGEN.
- New Multiplayer menu: you can now change cosmetics during multiplayer.
- Free Xmas themed matching mask and bracers!
- Fixed issue with tally for calories, punches, blocks and dodges not resetting each day.
- Various quality of life improvements.

- Updated multiplayer matchmaking backend to help find (when possible) players of similar skill. This works cross-platform, so you might find users from different platforms. The leaderboards are not crossplatform though. More platforms are being added as well, so expect an increase in players to match against!
- Updated multiplayer networking logic for a smoother experience overall, especially those with slower internet connections.
- Improved multiplayer collision detection and physics, which may change the scoring slightly in some instances. We're still in beta! (for now)
- Various smaller bug fixes overall. Thanks to everyone who has been helping find and squash them!

Now back to training!

- Updated multiplayer matchmaking backend to help find (when possible) players of similar skill. This works cross-platform, so you might find users from different platforms. The leaderboards are not crossplatform though. More platforms are being added as well, so expect an increase in players to match against!
- Updated multiplayer networking logic for a smoother experience overall, especially those with slower internet connections.
- Improved multiplayer collision detection and physics, which may change the scoring slightly in some instances. We're still in beta! (for now)
- Various smaller bug fixes overall. Thanks to everyone who has been helping find and squash them!

Now back to training!

- New mask: Furtive!
- Added spatial sound to arrows mod! (About time)
- Fixed issue with leaderboard stuck in a loading loop on Fight Level 8.
- Fixed issue with localization text not loading on Fight Weekly leaderboard.
- Fixed wrong music playing when joining a session in some instances.

v1.1
- MULTIPLAYER: Engage in thrilling 1-minute rounds against other players. Be the first to win 3 rounds to claim victory.
- WEEKLY LEADERBOARDS: Most of the game modes now have weekly leaderboards, so stay active to stay on top!
- MASK COSMETICS: Show off your unique look in multiplayer with the introduction of cosmetic MASKS.
- PERFORMANCE BOOST: Owners of Quest 2, Quest 3, and Pro models can now enjoy a performance upgrade, making your gameplay smoother than ever!
- LIGHTNING FAST: For those looking to amp up their workouts, the SPEED setting in the WORKOUT FLOW is now even faster, giving you a thrilling challenge!
- SHORTCUT TO SUCCESS: Get to your MY DOJO in a flash with a handy shortcut button from game mode pages. 
- FEEL THE KUNG FU: bHaptics has been updated to v2, and redesigned from the ground up. Expect more haptic variety now depending on the dummy arms you hit and with which part of your body!

v1.1
- MULTIPLAYER: Engage in thrilling 1-minute rounds against other players. Be the first to win 3 rounds to claim victory.
- WEEKLY LEADERBOARDS: Most of the game modes now have weekly leaderboards, so stay active to stay on top!
- MASK COSMETICS: Show off your unique look in multiplayer with the introduction of cosmetic MASKS.
- PERFORMANCE BOOST: Owners of Quest 2, Quest 3, and Pro models can now enjoy a performance upgrade, making your gameplay smoother than ever!
- LIGHTNING FAST: For those looking to amp up their workouts, the SPEED setting in the WORKOUT FLOW is now even faster, giving you a thrilling challenge!
- SHORTCUT TO SUCCESS: Get to your MY DOJO in a flash with a handy shortcut button from game mode pages. 
- FEEL THE KUNG FU: bHaptics has been updated to v2, and redesigned from the ground up. Expect more haptic variety now depending on the dummy arms you hit and with which part of your body!

First patch since exiting Early Access. A few quality of life fixes, enjoy:

- Fixed EVENT menu panel text still showing LOCKED in some instances when it should say ENTER (this is just a text issue, the panel was accessible even when it said LOCKED!)
- Fixed scores not uploading to leaderboard for TRAIN and FIGHT level 10.
- Fixed issue where a LEVEL 11 in FIGHT mode would appear at the end of LEVEL 10  (there is no LEVEL 11) ^^
- Fixed issue where if you played WORKOUT and then afterwards during the same session played a level in TRAIN TIER 2, the dummy wouldn't pivot side to side.
- Fixed FIGHT stabbing arm (levels 6-10) not rendering correctly.
- Fixed a font issue in certain languages where some letters would render differently than others.
- FIGHT mode now has some modifiers available! (more to come)
- TRAIN TIER 3 no longer has the NoGhost mod available, as there are no ghosts anyway in Tier 3.
- Fixed issue in FIGHT were in some instances mistakes wouldn't remove hearts.

Exiting AppLab with a Bang! This is a very big update, check it out:

- GAMEPLAY mechanics are smoother, with optimized mechanics, enhanced visuals, and an overall more polished and enjoyable Crazy Kung Fu experience.
- MENU SYSTEM has been revamped to be more intuitive and help you get into your training more effeciently.
- WORKOUT mode: A new game mode that's more fitness focused whilst still working on your Kung Fu training.
- EVENT mode: Weekly generated routines based on what you've completed in all the game modes.
- SCOREBOARD has been updated to make things clearer and easier to track whilst in the middle of your training.
- RESULTS board is all new with easier to read data points on your punches, blocks and dodges. You'll even see how much of everything you've done each day!
- ENVIRONMENTS have been cleaned up, especially Bamboo (that one has been redone from scratch). And there's new music as well!
- DLCs has been added to the store, with an in-game shop section on the menu as well. You'll find new Dojos and Bracers to purchase to reflect your style.
- LANGUAGES: French, German, Polish, Italian, Spanish, Japanse and Korean have all been added to the game. Enjoy!
- LEADERBOARDS: There are now leaderboards per Level rather than per Tier. So you can really see how great your Kung Fu is compared to those on the same Level!
- INDUCTION: There's a new intro to the game now, and you'll get to choose from two different Masters!
- TIPS have been added throughout the game, so while browsing different game modes or parts of the menu you can get more insight into what it all means.

- Fixed EVENT menu panel text still showing LOCKED when it should say ENTER (this is just a text issue, the panel was accessible even when it said LOCKED!)
- Fixed scores not uploading to leaderboard for TRAIN and FIGHT level 10.
- Fixed issue where a LEVEL 11 in FIGHT mode would appear at the end of LEVEL 10  (there is no LEVEL 11) ^^
- Fixed issue where if you played WORKOUT and then afterwards during the same session played a level in TRAIN TIER 2, the dummy wouldn't pivot side to side.
- Fixed FIGHT stabbing arm (levels 6-10) not rendering correctly.
- Fixed a font issue in certain languages where some letters would render differently than others.
- FIGHT mode now has some modifiers available! (more to come)
- TRAIN TIER 3 no longer has the NoGhost mod available, as there are no ghosts anyway in Tier 3.
- Fixed issue in FIGHT were in some instances mistakes wouldn't remove hearts.

Exiting AppLab with a Bang! This is a very big update, check it out:

- GAMEPLAY mechanics are smoother, with optimized mechanics, enhanced visuals, and an overall more polished and enjoyable Crazy Kung Fu experience.
- MENU SYSTEM has been revamped to be more intuitive and help you get into your training more effeciently.
- WORKOUT mode: A new game mode that's more fitness focused whilst still working on your Kung Fu training.
- EVENT mode: Weekly generated routines based on what you've completed in all the game modes.
- SCOREBOARD has been updated to make things clearer and easier to track whilst in the middle of your training.
- RESULTS board is all new with easier to read data points on your punches, blocks and dodges. You'll even see how much of everything you've done each day!
- ENVIRONMENTS have been cleaned up, especially Bamboo (that one has been redone from scratch). And there's new music as well!
- DLCs has been added to the store, with an in-game shop section on the menu as well. You'll find new Dojos and Bracers to purchase to reflect your style.

- LEADERBOARDS: There are now leaderboards per Level rather than per Tier. So you can really see how great your Kung Fu is compared to those on the same Level!

- Free LIBERATOR bracer unlocked if you leave a review on the Quest Store page. As a thank you for the support! (Please wait around 24 hours for the review to be proccessed)

- Wing Chun Dummy arms now wobble when you make contact :)
- Fixed issue with red balls floating in mid air in some instances at the start of Expert levels.
- Fixed issue in Focus mode where punch pads would appear even if you didn't select them.

- Free LIBERATOR bracer unlocked if you leave a review on the Qeust Store page. As a thank you for the support! (Please wait around 24 hours for the review to be proccessed)

- Wing Chun Dummy arms now wobble when you make contact :)
- Fixed issue with red balls floating in mid air in some instances at the start of Expert levels.
- Fixed issue in Focus mode where punch pads would appear even if you didn't select them.

- Complete redesign of Torii Dojo environment. Much brighter, more interesting and highly optimised!
- New lighting / textures of Cave Dojo and Hall Dojo.
- Improved fidelity of reflective surfaces on bracers, so they feel even better in the various Dojos.
- New level end for when failing from too many mistakes, so that it's clearer now when this has happened.
- The lower blades on the dummy now have a shorter range, this is to allow for cleaner fluidity between movements.
- Further deep optimisation for both Q1 and Q2 to allow for a much more stable framerate when playing in the highest levels at speed.
- Added volume control for music (saves between sessions).
- Added reminder during tutorial that it's possible to skip it.
- Fixed tutorial board remaining when starting a level after finishing tutorial in some instances.
- Fixed multiplier icons not showing when starting the game.
- Fixed "Retry" panel showing level numbers in Focus mode (there are no levels in Focus).
- Fixed total score not displayed in some instances in Focus mode.
- Fixed issue where red screen fade would remain on screen if got hit exactly when level ends. 
- Fixed issue where if your score was too big a number it would be displayed in scientific notation (Yes, some of you are THAT good).

v0.92.21
- Fixed issue where it wasn't possible to select custom songs in the menu. (thanks to @Ahlys)

v0.92.20
- Matching gloves for unlockable bracers!
- Fixed issue with dialogue text not displaying properly in some instances.
- Fixed issue with local scoreboard overflowing!
- Fixed issue with NEXT plank not responding correctly in some instances.
- General quality of life improvements, including performance, storage and textures.

- Matching gloves for unlockable bracers!
- Fixed issue with dialogue text not displaying properly in some instances.
- Fixed issue with local scoreboard overflowing!
- Fixed issue with NEXT plank not responding correctly in some instances.
- General quality of life improvements, including performance, storage and textures.

- New bracers: Improviser & Legend
- Various texture/model improvements.
- Updated entire text display system so it's easier to read but also performs better overall.
- Update leaderboard panels and display, so the banner color works better with the text, and your name/score is a different color so you can quickly see where you are.
